name: WooCommerce Click & Pledge Gateway
author: Click & Pledge

sections.description:
The WooCommerce Click & Pledge gateway plugin allows you to accept online payments in your WordPress WooCommerce store. Download the WooCommerce Click & Pledge plugin and start accepting payments from all major brands with your Click & Pledge account: Visa,American Express,Discover,MasterCard.

WooCommerce plugin
WooCommerce plugin is an e-commerce toolkit that helps you sell anything. Transform your WordPress website into online eCommerce store. Delivering enterprise-level quality, features and add ons to help you control your users experience.

This plugin works with the WooCommerce plugin and allows you to accept payments via your online store.

About Click & Pledge
Click & Pledge was Founded in May 2000. To be sure, Click & Pledge is not too good to be true. It is, however, a Company that has changed the way non-profits do business. Not only do we deliver the most comprehensive cloud-based fund raising and management products, but we lower your risk, save you money and offer exciting new ways for organizations to run. Since 2002, Click & Pledge has served over 10,000 customers in 46 countries and we re carefully expanding. Good, but not too good to be true.

Please note: This addon requires that you have a Click & Pledge Account to accept credit card and debit card payments. You can get an account at Click & Pledge. If you have any questions you can Contact Us anytime.
sections.installation:
Note:Click here for detailed instructions

Simply follow these steps to install:
1. Download & Unzip the file.
2. Upload the “woocommerce-clickandpledge-gateway” folder to your WordPress Plugins directory.
3. Login to your WordPress Admin, then go to Plugins and activate the “WooCommerce Click & Pledge Gateway” plugin
4. Within the WordPress Admin, go to WooCommerce >> Settings, then click on the Checkout tab, then click on the “Click & Pledge” link.
5. Enter the proper information

To use in “Live Mode”

1. Gather your Click & Pledge API “Account ID” and “API Account GUID”
2. Login to your WordPress Admin.
3. Go to WooCommerce >> Settings >> Click & Pledge.
4. Un-check “Enable Click & Pledge Test”.
5. Enter your “Account ID” (See step 1 above).
6. Enter your API “API Account GUID” (See step 1 above).
7. Click “Save”. Your website/shopping cart is now setup to process transactions via your Click & Pledge acount. We recommend that you process a test transaction, then login to your Click & Pledge account to confirm that it appears in your account.

To use in “Test Mode”
1. Gather your Click & Pledge API “Account ID” and “API Account GUID”
2. Login to your WordPress Admin.
3. Go to WooCommerce >> Settings >> Click & Pledge.
4. Check the box for “Enable Click & Pledge Test”.
5. Enter your “Account ID” (See step 1 above).
6. Enter your API “API Account GUID” (See step 1 above).
7. Click “Save”. Your website/shopping cart is now setup to process transactions via your Click & Pledge acount. We recommend that you process a test transaction, then login to your Click & Pledge account to confirm that it appears in your account.

Test Credit Card Info:
Test Credit Card: 4111111111111111
Test Expiration Date: 01/28
Test CCV: 111

2018.01.10 – Version 2.200.001
* https://forums.clickandpledge.com/forum/platform-product-forums/3rd-party-integrations/woocommerce-wordpress-plugin/25113-release-notes.

2017.11.02 – Version 2.200.000
* https://forums.clickandpledge.com/forum/platform-product-forums/3rd-party-integrations/woocommerce-wordpress-plugin/25113-release-notes.

2017.03.27 – Version 2.100.007
* Product bundle plugin compatibility update.
* Hiding of the gateway information when the balance is $0, allowing for custom payment type processing as a free transaction.

2017.02.17 – Version 2.100.006
* Allowing $0 custom payment type as well as pre-authorization. The feature requires a change in the WooCommerce configuration file on the server.

2017.02.10 – Version 2.100.004

  • Addition of Connect Campaign URL Alias allowing for updating of the set campaign as well as sending the selected campaign customized receipt.
  • Compatibility with the latest Woocommerce release v2.6.14.

2016.11.18 – Version 2.100.003

  • Fixed an issue with tax calculation
  • Resolved an issue where the email to the patron was being sent even though the option was disabled

2016.09.20 – Version 2.100.002

  • Compatible with ‘Woocommerce Product Bundles’ plugin

2016.07.29 – Version 2.000.005

  • Fixed Custom Questions issue

2016.07.22 – Version 2.000.003

2016.07.19 – Version 2.000.000

  • Enhancements:

  • Standardized ItemID numbering, matching other apps: 101001, 101002, .. WooCommerce itemID’s start based on 101xxx

  • Card Type: A subsection of Credit Card, Visa, MasterCard, etc.
  • Transaction Mode: Changes to radio button in the admin
  • Recurring Setting: Adding several options to address variations in customer requirements.

  • Handling products with variations

  • Changes:

  • Removal of Invoice & Purchase order from payment options. These options are no longer needed as they may be added as custom payment types.

  • Bug Fixes:

  • Fixing an issue with tax calculation

2015.06.24 – Version 1.3.5
* Added feature to allow zero amount processing

2015.06.02 – Version 1.3.4
* Fixed Item Name issue

2015.04.28 – Version 1.3.3
* Fixed issue at price for donation

2015.04.23 – Version 1.3.2
* Fixed issue at price

2015.04.20 – Version 1.3.1
* Fixed issue at shipping method

2015.03.20 – Version 1.3.0

  • Fixed issue at check out (Ref:https://forums.clickandpledge.com/showthread.php?t=2393)
  • Added eCheck, Purchase Order, Invoice
  • Added more flexibility to opt for different Payment methods provided by Click & Pledge

2015.01.27 – Version 1.2.3
* Fixed issue for total amount for decimal values

2014.11.20 – Version 1.2.2

  • Fixed SKU issue for variable products (Ref: https://github.com/ClickandPledge/WordPress-WooCommerce/issues/1#issuecomment-62725847).

2014.10.07 – Version 1.2.1

  • Fixed special character issue (Ref: https://forums.clickandpledge.com/showthread.php?t=2103).

2014.05.06 – Version 1.2.0
* Added the feature to send receipt to patron or not.

2014.04.22 – Version 1.1.0

  • Fixed the issue to find country code for shipping.
  • Fixed ‘wrapper is disabled in the server configuration by allow_url_fopen=0’ warning where “allow_url_fopen” disabled in php.ini.
  • Fixed the issue to display shipping method title.

2014.01.10 – version 1.0.1
* Code Released to public
